Html:
Hi,

I have a large / important production application running on the "Jun 25 2009" release of the DataGrid in the WPF Toolkit.

I am putting together a new release of my app (with new features).  Should I upgrade to the .Net 4.0 RTM version of the DataGrid now the .Net 4.0 has been released?

Are there breaking changes documented somewhere if any?

Thanks,
Jon
